Text: Garden City Golf Club:  The club was founded in 1899, and is also known as the "Garden City Men's Club" or simply the "Men's Club" to distinguish it from the Garden City Country Club, and Cherry Valley Club, all of which are located in Garden City, NY.

Triplets:<Garden City Golf Club
2:
--------------------
Text: Garden City Golf Club:  It remains one of the few men-only golf clubs in the United States.
